nodedef.name: HobolinkService
nodedef.attr: Retrieves data for a dvice from the Hobolink repository

datadef.name: StationName
datadef.attr: The name of the Hobolink station.

datadef.name: LoggerID
datadef.attr: The code (serial number) for the logger to be monitored.

datadef.name: MetricLabels
datadef.attr: The labels to use for each channel.

datadef.name: AddUnitsToLabel
datadef.attr: If set, appends the units of the metric to its label.

datadef.name: Token
datadef.attr: The access token provided by Onset.

datadef.name: Password
datadef.attr: The Hobolink user password. (The value will no be stored in a readable format.)

datadef.name: GeoLatitude
datadef.attr: The latitude of the logging station.

datadef.name: GeoLongitude
datadef.attr: The longitude of the logging station.

datadef.name: GeoAltitude
datadef.attr: The altitude of the logging station.

datadef.name: DataLabel
datadef.attr: The label used for the entire data set.
